name: Shoot 'Em Down
description:
Overview

Meet Shoot 'Em Down, a reverse bullet hell game in a chocboard in which you control the boss!! Aimed for android devices, this game lets you be the one who slowly enters the battlefield in a dramatic manner and who dies with multiple, spetacular explosions!!

Obliterate all heros and players with your weapons, getting stronger and stronger as more heroes are killed!!

Controls

Tilt the phone to move the boss left and right, touch where you want to shoot! As simple as that.

When the upgrade menu pops up, just drag and drop the attachments you want to add to a slot, if you have the money to buy them!

Difficulty and Loss Conditions

Hard is the easiest mode for you,  for obvious reasons, while the tutorial is impossible!

Do what you can to lose the game! Avoid winning at all costs!!!!

You lose by defeating all heroes in a wave, you win when the heros defeat you!
